synonyms: pra-śabdena—by the prefix "pra"; mokṣa-abhisandhiḥ—the intention of liberation; api—certainly; nirastaḥ—nullified; iti—thus.
translation: "The prefix 'pra' [in the verse from Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam] indicates that the desire for liberation is completely rejected."

purport.content: This is an annotation by Śrīdhara Svāmī, the great commentator on Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam.
